Authors

  • Matt Wheeler. Author, maintainer.

  • Sooyeong Lim. Author.

    Modfied Cochran-Armitage test.

  • Dawan Taley. Compiler.

  • Cari Martini. Compiler.

  • Ashwin Raghuraman. Contributor.
    Modified code for (Jonckheere, Williams etc.) to make them standalone functions.

  • Steven Johnson. Contributor.
    Author of NLOPT.

  • Aymeric Stamm. Contributor.
    Maintainer of nloptr Packag 2.0.1 from which all compile scripts were taken.

  • Dirk Eddelbuettel. Contributor.
    Contributed script to download GSL, as in RcppGSL.

  • U.S. Deptartment of Health and Human Services. Copyright holder.
    Owns Copyright for all ToxicR code outside NLOPT and nloptr scripts.
